title: To Build a Fire (Part 2)
description: The man works frantically to build a fire. However, his hands are freezing quickly, making it difficult to gather sticks or light matches. The man becomes desperate and afraid as he recognizes that he is in danger and continues to fight for survival.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Similes                : Explain and practice writing similes
